review:
I'm awed! Brilliant actors who have put an amazing work in league. A simple yet subtle story which leaves you with a dainty afterthought.
I get why it didn't get those high numbers in charts. Recognition of suchlike requires a catholic taste, which is acquired.

You know when  a art a become good well it's only when it crafted beautifully. That's the wonder of this movie each and every scene crafted beautifully and you must have to watch it only for some remarkable performance by deepika,  pankaj  Kapoor,Dimple kapadia, and Naseerudhin Shah even Arjun Kapoor.

i really appreciate Homi Adajania for this cult classic. Its masterpiece n gem of a film. Simple story but narrated very beautifully. Pyar wale din saare ve, Khath lik ke gusaare ve, Oh fanny re.. oh fanny re..
How can the ratings be so low! It's real good. You can empathise with, can laugh on the characters,  can put a smile on throughout the journey. It's like a smooth single malt on a lazy afternoon.
There are very few movies in which u smile throughout the film... Finding fanny is one of them. I ponder why are the ratings so low... Just loved it..
Superb movie n the whole idea of movie going around finding fanny was intune, with background score and actors performing best its a good watch
Mi dipu_piku is always best in all movies. She is the real golden girl and dream girl and not so fake like others actresses.
I loved ever beat,every scene and character in this movie!!Pankaj kapoor and Nasser sir are just great actors to watch.Love this movie!!!😚😚😚😙😙😙
Just headache from starting to end why u wested time and money in the search of fanny. Really worst film.
